trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the <see cref="Overload:System.Threading.Semaphore.Release" /> method is called on a semaphore whose count is already at the maximum.
trans-unit.target: 对计数已达到最大值的信号量调用 <see cref="Overload:System.Threading.Semaphore.Release" /> 方法时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: The count on a semaphore is decremented each time a thread enters the semaphore, and incremented when a thread releases the semaphore.
trans-unit.target: 上一个信号量计数会递减每当一个线程进入信号量，和一个线程释放信号量时，会增加的时。

trans-unit.source: When the count is zero, subsequent requests block until other threads release the semaphore.
trans-unit.target: 当计数为零时，其他线程释放信号量一直进行阻止后续请求。

trans-unit.source: When all threads have released the semaphore, the count is at the maximum value specified when the semaphore was created.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有线程都已都释放信号量，计数是最大值时指定创建信号量。

trans-unit.source: If a programming error causes a thread to call the <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.Release%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method at this point, a <xref:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果编程错误导致调用线程<xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.Release%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法此时，<xref:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore> class does not enforce thread identity on calls to the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.Release%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore>类不会强制在调用线程标识<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.Release%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary for the same thread that called <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A> to call <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.Release%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 没有必要的线程调用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A>调用<xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.Release%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException> does not necessarily indicate a problem with the code where the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException> 不一定表示何处出现异常代码的问题。

trans-unit.source: Consider the following scenario: Thread A and thread B enter a semaphore that has a maximum count of two.
trans-unit.target: 考虑以下方案： 线程 A 和线程 B 进入了最大计数为两个信号量。

trans-unit.source: A programming error in thread B causes it to call <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.Release%2A> twice, so that the count on the semaphore is full.
trans-unit.target: 线程 B 中的编程错误导致它来调用<xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.Release%2A>两次，以便信号量计数已满。

trans-unit.source: As a result, when thread A eventually calls <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.Release%2A>, a <xref:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当线程 A 最终调用<xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.Release%2A>、<xref:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException>引发。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException> class, see the <xref:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException.%23ctor> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 有关 <xref:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException> 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 <xref:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException.%23ctor> 构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how a programming error in one thread can lead to a <xref:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException> in another thread: Two threads enter a semaphore.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示一个线程中的编程错误可能导致<xref:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException>另一线程中： 两个线程进入信号量。

trans-unit.source: The second thread releases the semaphore twice, while the first thread is still executing its task.
trans-unit.target: 第二个线程释放信号量两次，第一个线程仍在执行其任务时。

trans-unit.source: When the first thread finishes and releases the semaphore, the semaphore count is already full and an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 当第一个线程完成并释放信号量时，信号量计数已满，并引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException" /> class with default values.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Adding the given count to the semaphore would cause it to exceed its maximum count."
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>为系统提供的消息的描述错误，如"中添加给定的计数信号量将导致其超出其最大计数。"的新实例的属性

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException> 类的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The system-supplied error message string.
trans-unit.target: 系统提供的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的错误消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The content of `message` is a text string intended to inform the user about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 内容`message`文本字符串用于通知用户有关异常。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException> class initialized with this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值<xref:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException>使用此构造函数初始化的类。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 存放有关所引发异常的序列化对象数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 对象，它包含有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.SemaphoreFullException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。
